title: Steese Summer Solstice Bicycle Gran Fondo
description:
It's a gran fondo in 5 stages
Steese Summer Solstice 
Fairbanks to Circle Hot Springs, Alaska
Wed. Jun 18 to Sun. Jun 22, 2014
registration: Registration starts 12:00 am, Wed. April 30; all genders; ages 10 to 99; Complete event (all 5 stages): Regular fee: $49.95, Late fee after May 31: $74.95; On site fee: $99.95/Per individual stage:Regular fee: $19.95, Late fee after May 31: $29.95; On site fee: $39.95/The regular portion of your fee less USA Cycling administrative charges will be refunded upon request through Wednesday, May 21.
notes:
All minor children under the age of 16 (10 to 15) must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian; Youth under the age of 18 (16 to 17) must have a notarized liability waiver signed by a parent or legal guardian; all food, clothing, equipment, shelter, transportation, and all other personal needs must be provided by the individual participant for her or himself, except that a participant's items with total weight less than or equal to 50 kg or 110 lbs in a single suitable container with no outside dimension greater than 1 m or 3 ft. 3-3/8 in., and with the other two dimensions less than or equal to 0.5 m or 1 ft. 7-11‚ÅÑ16 in will be transported between Stage locations. 

will be transported between sites  The route of this race goes deep into the wilderness of Interior Alaska with its risks that the individual participant may have to manage by her or himself. Find out what you need to know before you enter.
directions:
Stage 1: Wednesday, June 18th: Gold Hill Alaska, 3040 George Parks Hwy,  Fairbanks
Stage 2:  Thursday, June 19th: Chatanika Lodge, Mile 28, Steese Highway
Stage 3: Friday, June 20th: Sourdough Creek, Mile 66, Steese Highway
Stage 4: Saturday, June 21st, 12 Mile Summit, Mile 85, Steese Highway
Stage 5: Sunday, June 22nd, Eagle Summit, Mile 107, Steese Highway
